html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08222024-06-21NRCAN
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectOrder approving to amend the Shareholders Agreement between Foothills and TransCanada PipeLines Limited
PrecisOrder approving AMENDMENTS to the Amended and Restated Shareholders Agreement between FOOTHILLS PIPE LINES LTD. and TRANSCANADA PIPELINES LIMITED in order to facilitate potential future sales of a minority interest in the three Foothills subsidiaries that are currently operational and form part of the Foothills natural gas pipeline system in central and southern Alberta, southern Saskatchewan, and southeastern British Columbia.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving AMENDMENTS to the Amended and Restated Shareholders Agreement between FOOTHILLS PIPE LINES LTD. and TRANSCANADA PIPELINES LIMITED in order to facilitate potential future sales of a minority interest in the three Foothills subsidiaries that are currently operational and form part of the Foothills natural gas pipeline system in central and southern Alberta, southern Saskatchewan, and southeastern British Columbia.
